```{r Part B, Q1}
calcMean <- function(x) {
  newVector <- x[!is.na(x)]
  sumVector <- sum(newVector)
  meanVector <- sumVector / length(newVector)
  if(sum(is.na(x)) != 0) {
    warning(
      sum(is.na(x)),
      " NAs in vector",
      call. = FALSE
    )
  }
}
```
